Item ID22430

The Bloody bracer is an ale purchasable at the Rat & Bat in the town of Slepe. Drinking it heals players for 2 hitpoints, but drains prayer points by 2 + 4% of the player's current prayer level, rounded down. The hitpoints healed from the drink can heal players above their maximum health.

Upon drinking the ale, a message in the chatbox will state The tincture tastes great, but you feel an evil within you stir.

[[File:Bloody bracer detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Bloody bracer''' is an ale purchasable at the [[Rat & Bat]] in the town of [[Slepe]]. Drinking it heals players for 2 hitpoints, but drains prayer points by 2 + 4% of the player's current prayer level, rounded down. The hitpoints healed from the drink can heal players above their maximum health.

Upon drinking the ale, a message in the chatbox will state ''The tincture tastes great, but you feel an evil within you stir.''
